Topic.Title: How can I permanently delete an unlisted/unpublished link game?

Posts.EditableText: Hello ! I'm new here, I made a game online, which I later deleted (I never posted it publicly). But because I have the link of the deleted game, it still exists on the website, can I delete it permanently so that it does not exist at all?
Posts.HTML: Hello ! I'm new here, I made a game online, which I later deleted (I never posted it publicly). But because I have the link of the deleted game, it still exists on the website, can I delete it permanently so that it does not exist at all?

Posts.EditableText: Hey dude! If the website is hosted on Google, you should open the "More Actions" drop-down menu, then find the "Manage Site" option. Select "General" from this menu you can remove the site. After clicking "Delete this site," confirm your choice. The actions may vary depending on the hosting, but the principle is the same. I don't know about games; I mostly only play Meinkrafat; I think you've heard of it, you can look here for new servers if you're interested https://minecraft.buzz/, but it should work. As far as I know, you can't delete the website completely; it's archived so that you can restore it later. I'd be glad if it helped you!
